xldoc.title: Part II - The Twentieth Century
xldoc.description: An analytic history of philosophical logic covering most of the twentieth century.
xldoc.keywords: rbjones philosophy analytic semantics meaning necessity logic metaphysics Plato Aristotle

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: The coverage of the twentieth century emphasises those aspects of the development of philosophical logic, semantics and metaphysics which have greatest relevance to the method adopted in this analysis, "The Method of Formal Logical Analysis", and culminates with a full account of the method and some ideas about its scope of applicability, within analytic philosophy and elsewhere.
